subject: FROM:EFCC FUNDS COMPENSATION D
body:
FROM:EFCC FUNDS COMPENSATION DEPT
ECONOMICAL FINANCIAL CRIME COMMISSION (EFCC)
NO 15/18 AWOLOWO ROAD, IKOYI,
LAGOS.NIGERIA.
Dear Beneficiary,
This is to notify you and the public that the former chairman of THE ECONOMIC FINANCIAL CRIME COMMISSION MR. ABDULRASHEED BAWA has been suspended from the office due to corruptions and has been replaced by MR OLANIPEKUN OLUKAYODEAS as the New Chairman of the Commission in conjunction with Economic Community of West African states (ECOWAS) with head Office in Nigeria. We have been working towards the suppression of fraudsters and scam in Western part of Africa, with the help of United States Government and the United Nations we have been able to tracked down so many of this scam artist in various parts of West African countries which includes (NIGERIA, REPUBLIC OF BENIN, TOGO, GHANA, CAMEROON, SENEGAL LONDON and others countries in the world) and they are all in our custody here in Lagos Nigeria. We have been able to recover huge sum of money from these scammers.
The United Nation Anti-crime commission and the United State Government have ordered that the money recovered from them should be DONATED as among 100 Lucky people around the globe . This message is being directed to you because your email address was found in one of the scam Artists file and computer hard disk in our custody here in Nigeria. You have been short listed among the lucky beneficiary to receive the sum of compensation of $5,500, 000) FIVE Million Five Hundred Thousand United State Dollars.
According to the record we have here, this Scam Artists has defrauded a lot of people of their hard earned currencies, as they claims to be Barristers/Bank officials,Military Soldiers, Face book Friends, Lottery Agents, Financial Loan Assistance, next of kin funds transfer and job offer which do not really exist. Since
your email address appeared among the beneficiaries who will receive this donation compensation of Five Million Five Hundred Thousand United State Dollars only, we have arranged your payment in certified bank atm transfer that will enable you withdraw and transfer your money to any account from any atm machine nearest to you.
Kindly reconfirm the below information to enable us follow up the finalizing process of your donation compensation payment via atm card with the bank.
Full Name....
Mobile Number......
Email.............
Next of Kin Email.............
Mailing Contact Address...
City:........
State............
Nearest Airport .......
Occupation...................
Sex..................
Age...................
We sincerely apologize on behalf of the President and the good citizens of Nigeria/London for any delay and lost this might have coursed you and promise that such thing will not happen again.
We will have the bank uploaded your funds on the ATM Debit Cash Card as soon as this is done, then we will proceed to dispatch the card directly to your nominated mailing address by certify courier service.
So you absolutely have nothing to worry about as all we need is your prompt response and co-operation. We guarantee you 100% safety
We look forward for your response further information
Yours Sincerely
Barr.Sylvanus Tahir
For Economic and Financial Crimes Commission

subject: Re: FROM:EFCC FUNDS COMPENSATION D
body:
Hello Tahir,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. It's quite surprising to hear that my email address was found in one of the scam artist's files. I'm glad to know that actions are being taken against these individuals.

I'm curious, how did you manage to track down these scam artists? It must have been a challenging task given the vastness of the regions mentioned. Also, could you please elaborate on how the selection process for the lucky recipients of this donation was conducted?

As much as I appreciate your offer, I would like to understand more about this process before proceeding further. Could you also provide more details about this certified bank ATM transfer? How does it work exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lisa
